title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART
description:
Evrart Claire is the head of the Dockworkers' Union. Wealthy, lazy, smart cat - player.

In this dialogue you can:

* Enlist Evrart's aid to get the body down (he asks measurehead to do it).
* Get bent and earn a daily income by doing so (corrupt cop).
* Find out about the neighbourhood.

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois! Every worker for hims..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois! Every worker for himself, right?" He smiles a wide sly smile. "What can I do for you today?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois, every worker..." He l..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois, every worker..." He looks around, searching for something in his room. "To hell with it... Every worker is white! Now, what can I do for you today?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois! Every worker is a god..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois! Every worker is a god, right?" He chuckles. "What can I do for you today?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois! Every worker -- membe..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois! Every worker -- member of the board!" He smiles merrily. "How can I help you today?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois, a pleasure as always...."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois, a pleasure as always." He grins as if nothing in the world bothers him.

links.title: Authority: "Oh, I bet he's still fuming interna..."
links.text: Oh, I bet he's still fuming internally due to your *no-sitting* escapades. He doesn't like to lose a battle of will.

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois, a pleasure as always..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois, a pleasure as always -- you don't have to sit down this time, since you've already sat on that chair."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois! I hope time is on you..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois! I hope time is on your side this time... Please, take a seat!" He smiles broadly, apparently unconcerned about the breakdown that interrupted your last conversation.

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois! I hope time is on you..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois! I hope time is on your side this time... Please, take a seat!" He gestures to the *miniscule* folding chair opposite his huge desk.

links.title: You: "Take a seat."
links.text: Take a seat.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Excellent, Mr. Du Bois, I can see..."
links.text: "Excellent, Mr. Du Bois, I can see that you're a reasonable man, and reasonable men... Reasonable men can be of great use to one other." He gives you a sly wink.

links.title: You: "Remain serious."
links.text: Remain serious.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""So tell me, how can the head of th..."
links.text: "So tell me, how can the head of the Débardeurs' Union help a representative of the Revachol Citizens Militia today?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, by the way, I heard you got a..."
links.text: "Oh, by the way, I heard you got a rather rude reception from a certain... Lawrence *Garte*. Some people have no manners, it pains me to say."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""*This* should take care of that no..."
links.text: "*This* should take care of that nonsense." He points to a giant novelty cheque on his desk -- it's absolutely, comically huge.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""It should be sufficient to cover y..."
links.text: "It should be sufficient to cover your expenses for a few days and patch over your differences with the cafeteria manager. Go ahead, take it." He points at it again.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Wow, that's 25 reál! That's good mo..."
links.text: Wow, that's 25 reál! That's good money. You *need* it.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes, but you'll *owe* him for it."
links.text: Yes, but you'll *owe* him for it.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Hey, that's 25 reál. That's good mo..."
links.text: Hey, that's 25 reál. That's good money. Think of all the *stuff* you could...

links.title: Authority: "...*owe* him for? This is a trap."
links.text: ...*owe* him for? This is a trap.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The chair you're sitting on has got..."
links.text: The chair you're sitting on has got to be the most uncomfortable chair in the world. It's *violating* your backside.

links.title: Endurance: "You've just got to grin and bear it..."
links.text: You've just got to grin and bear it. Like a champ. A champ with a rod up his ass!

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The chair is *incredibly* uncomfort..."
links.text: The chair is *incredibly* uncomfortable. Fortunately, your ass is made of *iron* and the chair is made of wood. Iron beats wood. You manage not to shift around too much...

links.title: You: "Try to wink back."
links.text: Try to wink back.

links.title: You: "Damn, this chair is uncomfortable....."
links.text: Damn, this chair is uncomfortable...

links.title: You: ""I'd rather stand.""
links.text: "I'd rather stand."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Please, Mr. Du Bois, let us conver..."
links.text: "Please, Mr. Du Bois, let us converse in a civilized manner, as equals. Take a seat -- I insist."

links.title: Authority: "He's trying to throw you off your g..."
links.text: He's trying to throw you off your game, thinking you don't know your name -- but you do! So the joke's on him, ha ha!

links.title: You: ""First, you can call me Harry, beca..."
links.text: "First, you can call me Harry, because that's my name."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Excellent, *Harry*." The smile wid..."
links.text: "Excellent, *Harry*." The smile widens. "Of course, that's your name. What else could it be? Now, please, have a seat."

links.title: Drama: "He's playing it cool, but he knows..."
links.text: He's playing it cool, but he knows his ploy didn't work.

links.title: You: ""I don't *sit*. It's kind of my thi..."
links.text: "I don't *sit*. It's kind of my thing."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Very well, Mr. Du Bois. I respect..."
links.text: "Very well, Mr. Du Bois. I respect a man with strong convictions..." As he nods, his multiple chins move like ocean waves.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I, too, have convictions, one of w..."
links.text: "I, too, have convictions, one of which is that I will not engage any man who won't face me at *eye level*."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Should you find yourself more amen..."
links.text: "Should you find yourself more amenable in the future, I'd gladly resume our conversation. But until then, I'm afraid I must ask you to leave." He turns back to his typewriter.

links.title: Volition: "Don't give up -- but don't leave ei..."
links.text: Don't give up -- but don't leave either. You're going to have this conversation on your terms. You just need to remain headstrong.

links.title: You: "Remain standing and don't go anywhe..."
links.text: Remain standing and don't go anywhere.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "Evrart starts whistling a little wo..."
links.text: Evrart starts whistling a little worker song. He really is trying to ignore you... or *will* you out of existence.

links.title: You: "Stand strong."
links.text: Stand strong.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant stands right next to..."
links.text: The lieutenant stands right next to you, not showing any signs of impatience or boredom.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I see you are an extremely stubbor..."
links.text: "I see you are an extremely stubborn man, Mr. Du Bois... That ain't necessarily a bad thing." Finally, the big man looks you in the eye and speaks.

links.title: Volition: "You did it! This might help against..."
links.text: You did it! This might help against whatever comes next...

links.title: You: "Leave quietly. [Leave.]"
links.text: Leave quietly. [Leave.]

links.title: Volition: "Damn... that's a nasty play. He's g..."
links.text: Damn... that's a nasty play. He's got you -- a titan of Volition -- in a fork. Guess you just have to sit or leave.

links.title: Volition: "You're no titan of Volition, buddy...."
links.text: You're no titan of Volition, buddy. He's got you in a fork. Sit down or leave.

links.title: You: ""Actually I was just leaving." [Lea..."
links.text: "Actually I was just leaving." [Leave.]

links.title: Authority: "He's trying to throw you off your g..."
links.text: He's trying to throw you off your game with this *Du Bois* nonsense -- don't give him the pleasure.

links.title: You: ""Why are you calling me 'Mr. Du Boi..."
links.text: "Why are you calling me 'Mr. Du Bois'?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Please, Mr. Du Bois, let us conver..."
links.text: "Please, Mr. Du Bois, let us converse in a civilized manner, as equals. Take a seat -- I insist."

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's nothing. Yes, that's *probably..."
links.text: It's nothing. Yes, that's *probably* right. It's nothing. Forget about it, filter it out.

links.title: You: ""Actually, I'm in a bit of a hurry..."
links.text: "Actually, I'm in a bit of a hurry right now." [Leave.]

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Have a good day, Mr. Du Bois, I'm..."
links.text: "Have a good day, Mr. Du Bois, I'm sure I'll be seeing you around." He waves and returns to typing.

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois! I take it you have re..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois! I take it you have reconsidered your stance on the etiquette of verbal communication?" He points to the *tiny* chair.

links.title: You: "Sit."
links.text: Sit.

links.title: You: "Don't sit. [Leave.]"
links.text: Don't sit. [Leave.]

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Have it your way, Mr. Du Bois. You..."
links.text: "Have it your way, Mr. Du Bois. You'll be back..."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: "Before you is a walrus of a man sea..."
dialogueTree.text: Before you is a walrus of a man seated behind a large desk. He looks up from his work, not the least bit surprised to see you...

links.title: Evrart Claire: "With great effort, he straightens h..."
links.text: With great effort, he straightens himself up in his chair, yet says nothing. He simply stares at you.

links.title: Composure: "With a mixture of expectation and i..."
links.text: With a mixture of expectation and impatience, well bottled.

links.title: Volition: "A typical power play. Wait for him..."
links.text: A typical power play. Wait for him to speak first -- show him you've got a backbone.

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Look him dead in the e..."
links.text: Say nothing. Look him dead in the eye.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "The one good eye of this man feels..."
links.text: The one good eye of this man feels you up without even flickering. The other -- his lazy eye -- is constantly moving like a goldfish in a tank.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Grotesquely magnified by his +6 gla..."
links.text: Grotesquely magnified by his +6 glasses.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Amblyopia. A childhood condition."
links.text: Amblyopia. A childhood condition.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "For a moment you don't know where t..."
links.text: For a moment you don't know where to look. It is unbearably humid in the trailer. Beads of sweat slide down the man's forehead.

links.title: Endurance: "Yet he's unperturbed. Holding his o..."
links.text: Yet he's unperturbed. Holding his own.

links.title: You: "Stop. This is getting too weird."
links.text: Stop. This is getting too weird.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "His look goes from steely to inquis..."
links.text: His look goes from steely to inquisitive. A broad, self-satisfied grin crosses his wide face. You hear the wet smack of his lips.

links.title: You: ""Hello. I have, uh, law enforcement..."
links.text: "Hello. I have, uh, law enforcement business with you."

links.title: You: "Keep staring."
links.text: Keep staring.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "At first, nothing happens. His face..."
links.text: At first, nothing happens. His face wears a wide and self-satisfied smile. Every now and then, he smacks his big lips.

links.title: Authority: "Like a general over his maps, he pl..."
links.text: Like a general over his maps, he plots his moves. Judging by the way he's licking his chops, it's going to be a good one.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Soooo..." He begins to speak, albe..."
links.text: "Soooo..." He begins to speak, albeit very slowly -- purposefully leaving a pause after his opener.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""...Mr. Du Bois, Mr. Kitsuragi, how..."
links.text: "...Mr. Du Bois, Mr. Kitsuragi, how nice that you found a moment to pay a visit to the Débardeurs' Union. I'm Evrart Claire, head of this little operation here."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Please, have a seat." He gestures..."
links.text: "Please, have a seat." He gestures to a *tiny* folding chair -- opposite to his giant desk.

links.title: Composure: "The folding chair looks like a tort..."
links.text: The folding chair looks like a torture device. Extremely uncomfortable.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""...Mr. Du Bois, how nice that you..."
links.text: "...Mr. Du Bois, how nice that you found a moment to pay a visit to the Débardeurs' Union. I'm Evrart Claire, head of this little operation here."

links.title: You: ""Are you in charge of the dockworke..."
links.text: "Are you in charge of the dockworkers?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Welcome, Mr. Du Bois, Mr. Kitsurag..."
links.text: "Welcome, Mr. Du Bois, Mr. Kitsuragi. It's good of you two to stop by. Please, have a seat." He gestures to a *tiny* chair opposite to his giant desk.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm Evrart, Evrart Claire, head of..."
links.text: "I'm Evrart, Evrart Claire, head of the Débardeurs' Union here in Martinaise." The man relaxes into his chair and continues:

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'd offer you my hand, but unfortu..."
links.text: "I'd offer you my hand, but unfortunately my health prevents me from getting up. You understand."

links.title: Composure: "He looks extremely comfortable. The..."
links.text: He looks extremely comfortable. The tiny folding chair, on the other hand, looks like a torture device.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You go ahead, detective." The lieu..."
links.text: "You go ahead, detective." The lieutenant nods at you, then the chair.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Whatever he has in store for you, i..."
links.text: Whatever he has in store for you, it can't be good, he thinks. I'll do my best.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Forget about that. What's with this..."
links.text: Forget about that. What's with this Du Bois stuff? You're getting some seriously bad vibes from that name...

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Welcome, Mr. Du Bois. It's good of..."
links.text: "Welcome, Mr. Du Bois. It's good of you to stop by. Please, have a seat." He gestures to a *tiny* chair opposite to his giant desk.

links.title: You: ""Let's get straight to business. Th..."
links.text: "Let's get straight to business. There's a dead body in a tree."

links.title: You: ""Let's get straight to business. Th..."
links.text: "Let's get straight to business. There's been a murder."

links.title: You: "Leave without comment. [Leave.]"
links.text: Leave without comment. [Leave.]

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Have a good day, Mr. Du Bois, I'm..."
links.text: "Have a good day, Mr. Du Bois, I'm sure I'll be seeing you around." He waves and returns to his typing.

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""So, the ship has sailed... did you..."
dialogueTree.text: "So, the ship has sailed... did you see it? I know you did." He leans toward you. "Tell me, what did it look like as it grew smaller and smaller? When that mainsail dropped behind the horizon..."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "There's a mean little light in his..."
links.text: There's a mean little light in his eyes.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""... did it look like a germ? Did i..."
links.text: "... did it look like a germ? Did it look like a piece of *bacteria*?"

links.title: Composure: "His tone is totally different now...."
links.text: His tone is totally different now. The jolly man of the people is gone and so is the smile.

links.title: Half Light: "His jaw is clenched and his quadrup..."
links.text: His jaw is clenched and his quadruple-chin is quivering with hatred. This is *decades* of hatred speaking right now.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You get a sinking feeling..."
links.text: You get a sinking feeling...

links.title: Logic: "Oh my god, you've been played!"
links.text: Oh my god, you've been played!

links.title: You: ""Yes, it sort of did look like that..."
links.text: "Yes, it sort of did look like that. A bacteria. Growing smaller and smaller."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You wanted us to relay all this in..."
links.text: "You wanted us to relay all this information to her..." the lieutenant cuts in.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I bet it did, I bet it did." He la..."
links.text: "I bet it did, I bet it did." He laughs, but his laughter is void of joy. "I guess what matters is that my message got across."

links.title: You: ""What message?""
links.text: "What message?"

links.title: You: ""No, it looked like a boat sailing..."
links.text: "No, it looked like a boat sailing away from the coast. No need to be overly dramatic."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You wanted us to relay all this in..."
links.text: "You wanted us to relay all this information to her..." the lieutenant cuts in.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You're right, Harry. There's is no..."
links.text: "You're right, Harry. There's is no need for that." He laughs, but his laughter is void of joy. "I guess what matters is that my message got across."

links.title: You: ""What message?""
links.text: "What message?"

links.title: You: ""I don't understand. What do you me..."
links.text: "I don't understand. What do you mean?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Don't worry, Harry. He does." He n..."
links.text: "Don't worry, Harry. He does." He nods towards the lieutenant. "At least I think he does."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You wanted us to relay all this in..."
links.text: "You wanted us to relay all this information to her..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""It's okay, Harry. I'm just thankfu..."
links.text: "It's okay, Harry. I'm just thankful you delivered my message."

links.title: You: ""You *wanted* me to deliver that me..."
links.text: "You *wanted* me to deliver that message to her..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""That this is a takeover, that I wa..."
links.text: "That this is a takeover, that I want a war?" He nods, forcefully. "God, I hope you also told her about the drug trade... They absolutely hate getting their hands dirty with that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You can kill a million people, but..."
links.text: "You can kill a million people, but if you do something the *po-lice* doesn't like... well, then you're out of the yacht-club." A vein on his forehead is pulsating. "Goodbye, you inhuman fuck..."

links.title: You: ""Now I know why you've been so fort..."
links.text: "Now I know why you've been so forthcoming."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""No, no, Harry, what we have is rea..."
links.text: "No, no, Harry, what we have is real. We're working men. This here..." He taps his chest, then points to you. "... is *real*."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "In there, under pillows of winter f..."
links.text: In there, under pillows of winter fat, his stress-ridden heart still beats furiously.

links.title: You: ""So this was your plan all along. F..."
links.text: "So this was your plan all along. For me to relay this information to her."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry..." He exhales slowly. "I ca..."
links.text: "Harry..." He exhales slowly. "I can't see into the future. We are all playing *by ear* on this planet. I had no idea she'd react so strongly."

links.title: You: ""But you did want me to relay info..."
links.text: "But you did want me to relay info to her?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I did. I knew the negotiations wou..."
links.text: "I did. I knew the negotiations would go better with police officers telling her horror stories from inside the harbour. It's scarier this way. Turns out it was a magnificent strategy. I never thought it'd so fundamentally fuck her up."

links.title: You: ""How do you know she left?""
links.text: "How do you know she left?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, I bugged her cabin. I bugge..."
links.text: "Harry, I bugged her cabin. I bugged her whole boat. I had cameras surveying her boat. Hell I even wanted to bug that thermal cup, but my boys advised against it."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "They must have done it while Joyce..."
links.text: They must have done it while Joyce was busy questioning the locals.

links.title: You: ""So you've been listening to our co..."
links.text: "So you've been listening to our conversations all the time?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Not me personally..." he stretches..."
links.text: "Not me personally..." he stretches his arms like a discus thrower. "I had guys recording and processing this information for me."

links.title: You: ""The Hardie boys?""
links.text: "The Hardie boys?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Hell no!" he exclaims. "They'd fuc..."
links.text: "Hell no!" he exclaims. "They'd fuck it up. They can't do anything right. I mean my *real* boys. My special task force boys."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Where are these boys?""
links.text: "Where are these boys?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""They sure as hell aren't hanging o..."
links.text: "They sure as hell aren't hanging out in the open with beers in their hands for the cops to question." He bursts out laughing. "They're pros, Mr. Kitsuragi."

links.title: You: ""Where are these boys now?""
links.text: "Where are these boys now?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""They sure as hell aren't hanging o..."
links.text: "They sure as hell aren't hanging out in the open with beers in their hands for the cops to question." He bursts out laughing. "They're pros, Harry."

links.title: You: ""You used me." (Proceed.)"
links.text: "You used me." (Proceed.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, you made a conscious decisi..."
links.text: "Harry, you made a conscious decision to relay that information to her. You could have kept it for yourself."

links.title: You: ""That's *wild* how you got me to do..."
links.text: "That's *wild* how you got me to do all that stuff." (Proceed.)

links.title: You: ""Thanks for letting me play a part,..."
links.text: "Thanks for letting me play a part, Evrart." (Proceed.)

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois! The word in Martinais..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois! The word in Martinaise is *a certain police officer* is once again happily reunited with his service weapon." He winks at you. "Congratulations, my friend!"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I prefer my police officers old-fa..."
links.text: "I prefer my police officers old-fashioned like that... with a gun. You can do so many things with a gun that you can't do without one. Now, what can I help you with?"

links.title: You: ""Have you heard about the horseback..."
links.text: "Have you heard about the horseback monument being renovated?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Ah yes, I was informed." He clasps..."
links.text: "Ah yes, I was informed." He clasps his hands together and rests them on his desk. "It seems to be a big undertaking. What are you hoping to achieve with it exactly?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Who told him it was you?!"
links.text: Who told him it was you?!

links.title: You: ""How did you know I was behind it?""
links.text: "How did you know I was behind it?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois, please, it is clearly..."
links.text: "Mr. Du Bois, please, it is clearly the work of a great businessman. And I know *I* didn't order it."

links.title: Rhetoric: "It's business etiquette to take com..."
links.text: It's business etiquette to take compliments even if they aren't sincere. Like this one.

links.title: You: ""Oh right. Thanks. Glad you think t..."
links.text: "Oh right. Thanks. Glad you think that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: "He grins slightly wider than usual,..."
links.text: He grins slightly wider than usual, pleased to know that you follow the rules of business etiquette.

links.title: You: ""I'm giving the ordinary folk a her..."
links.text: "I'm giving the ordinary folk a hero they can believe in -- *me*."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""A vanity project? Or is this your..."
links.text: "A vanity project? Or is this your way of inciting *rebellion*? Tut-tut, I thought you lawmen were supposed to keep the peace?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We are," the lieutenant says firml..."
links.text: "We are," the lieutenant says firmly as he meets Evrart's gaze. "And we will do our best to ensure that's what happens here."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Indeed." He turns back to you. "I'..."
links.text: "Indeed." He turns back to you. "I'm glad to see you making headway with your endeavours, Mr. Du Bois. I look forward to seeing the end result. Is there anything else on your mind?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""In any case, I'm glad to see you m..."
links.text: "In any case, I'm glad to see you making headway with your endeavours. I look forward to seeing the end result. Is there anything else on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""I want the people of this town to..."
links.text: "I want the people of this town to understand my net worth." (Show him the stock certificate.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Interesting. This is a small fortu..."
links.text: "Interesting. This is a small fortune waiting to be claimed." He turns his large face back to you. "Always exciting to see promising businessmen rise up through the chaff."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm glad to see you making headway..."
links.text: "I'm glad to see you making headway with your endeavours, Mr. Du Bois. I look forward to seeing the end result. Is there anything else on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""I'm looking for a cell of undergro..."
links.text: "I'm looking for a cell of underground communists. Can you help me?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois, really. Do I look lik..."
links.text: "Mr. Du Bois, really. Do I look like a man who has time for *underground* communists? I'm as aboveground as it gets!"

links.title: Logic: "That's a non sequitur if you've eve..."
links.text: That's a non sequitur if you've ever heard one!

links.title: You: ""Let's drop the funny stuff. I'm tr..."
links.text: "Let's drop the funny stuff. I'm trying to make contact with my revolutionary brethren."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Sure thing, Harry. We're *all busi..."
links.text: "Sure thing, Harry. We're *all business* now. The answer is still 'no'. I'm a busy man, as you can see. I don't block off time on my schedule for 'underground' types..."

links.title: Drama: "That note of contempt in his voice..."
links.text: That note of contempt in his voice is sincere, sssire.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You've already spoken with Mañana,..."
links.text: "You've already spoken with Mañana, as I understand. I'm afraid I don't have anything else for you on *this subject*..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""If you haven't spoken with my man..."
links.text: "If you haven't spoken with my man Mañana yet, I'd suggest you start there. He's more in touch with what's happening at the ground level, so to speak..."

links.title: Logic: "He's got you there. You've got to b..."
links.text: He's got you there. You've got to be 10 or 12 metres up, at least.

links.title: Rhetoric: "That's all you're going to get out..."
links.text: That's all you're going to get out of him, it appears.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now, was there anything else you w..."
links.text: "Now, was there anything else you wished to discuss today?"

links.title: You: ""I'm told the Union is involved in..."
links.text: "I'm told the Union is involved in the local drug trade."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What?!" He smacks his forehead, co..."
links.text: "What?!" He smacks his forehead, completely flabbergasted. "Harry... how could you say that to me? You know I appreciate a joke as much as any jolly fat guy, but I can't take *slander*. Are you actually investigating this?"

links.title: Drama: "The reaction appears to be sincere,..."
links.text: The reaction appears to be sincere, but... it's impossible to tell with this guy, honestly.

links.title: You: ""I am." (Lie.)"
links.text: "I am." (Lie.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You've hurt me, Harry -- me! A fri..."
links.text: "You've hurt me, Harry -- me! A friend!" The man rubs his temple and closes his eyes, in pain. "But you know what?" He perks up.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "And gets over it in two seconds? Se..."
links.text: And gets over it in two seconds? Seems like it didn't really hurt him.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I trust you, like I trust all my f..."
links.text: "I trust you, like I trust all my friends. And I know you'll never talk to me about this again, because you don't want to *wound* me. So do what you want -- and let's change the subject."

links.title: You: ""No, I'm not.""
links.text: "No, I'm not."

links.title: You: ""No comment.""
links.text: "No comment."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry..." He sighs. "You wound me,..."
links.text: "Harry..." He sighs. "You wound me, Harry. In the heart. But I trust you to put this to bed. Do what you must and let's change the subject, shall we?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's hiding his real reaction benea..."
links.text: He's hiding his real reaction beneath courtesy.

links.title: You: ""I've just finished investigating t..."
links.text: "I've just finished investigating the local drug trade."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Ah yes, your side-investigation! T..."
links.text: "Ah yes, your side-investigation! Thank you." He adjusts his glasses. "You've got some spirit, clearing up phony drug accusations alongside this murder. I'll talk to the mayor and see if I can get you the key to the city, Harry. Now let's talk real business."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Actually, Revachol doesn't have a m..."
links.text: Actually, Revachol doesn't have a mayor...

links.title: Rhetoric: "He refuses to discuss it further. I..."
links.text: He refuses to discuss it further. It's probably just a small nuisance to him.

links.title: Empathy: "Not even a speck of anger in his vo..."
links.text: Not even a speck of anger in his voice. That's that then.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You've got a lotta spirit, clearin..."
links.text: "You've got a lotta spirit, clearing up the drug problem alongside this murder." He adjusts his glasses. "I'll talk to the mayor and see if I can get you the key to the city, Harry. Now let's talk real business."

links.title: You: ""Look... my gun." (Show it to him.)"
links.text: "Look... my gun." (Show it to him.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""My, my..." He lets out an apprecia..."
links.text: "My, my..." He lets out an appreciative whistle. "She's quite the looker, Harry. You can't imagine how pleased I am the two of you are reunited."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Tell me, was it difficult to convi..."
links.text: "Tell me, was it difficult to convince..." The big man pauses to tap on his chin. "... The Pigs to give it up?"

links.title: You: ""You could say that. She tried to k..."
links.text: "You could say that. She tried to kill me."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I told you she was a piece of work..."
links.text: "I told you she was a piece of work, Harry." He nods gravely. "But I knew you could handle it. I know my special policeman. Anyway, I'm glad you're alright and armed again."

links.title: You: ""Not at all.""
links.text: "Not at all."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I knew you could handle it. I know..."
links.text: "I knew you could handle it. I know my special policeman. Anyway, I'm glad you're alright and armed again, Harry. Now, what can Evrart Claire do for you?"

links.title: You: ""The important thing is I got my gu..."
links.text: "The important thing is I got my gun back."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I guess you're right, Harry." He c..."
links.text: "I guess you're right, Harry." He chuckles. "I appreciate you coming back to report on your progress. Now, what can Evrart Claire do for you?"

links.title: You: ""Do you know there's a mega rich li..."
links.text: "Do you know there's a mega rich light-bending guy inside one of the containers outside?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mega rich light-bending guy? Oh my..."
links.text: "Mega rich light-bending guy? Oh my god! How did that get in there?"

links.title: You: ""He's so rich he could get in anywh..."
links.text: "He's so rich he could get in anywhere."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Damn it to hell, Harry!" He slams..."
links.text: "Damn it to hell, Harry!" He slams his fist on the table. "I specifically told my guys to check all the containers for mega rich light-bending guys."

links.title: You: ""Nothing can stop an innovative min..."
links.text: "Nothing can stop an innovative mind."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Honestly, Harry, we might be movin..."
links.text: "Honestly, Harry, we might be moving a spot of drugs through this harbour, but I won't be caught transporting the light-bending mega-rich." He shakes his head. "I have a reputation to protect."

links.title: You: ""I think he wants to take down the..."
links.text: "I think he wants to take down the proletariat, Evrart."

links.title: You: ""Kim, tell him he was there.""
links.text: "Kim, tell him he was there."

links.title: You: ""You know, some of him *may* have b..."
links.text: "You know, some of him *may* have been a figment of my imagination."

links.title: You: ""Slime like him? Must've oozed in t..."
links.text: "Slime like him? Must've oozed in through the cracks."

links.title: You: ""He must have been in the container..."
links.text: "He must have been in the container when someone accidentally closed the door."

links.title: You: ""I don't know how he got in there.""
links.text: "I don't know how he got in there."

links.title: You: ""I'm ready for my gun now.""
links.text: "I'm ready for my gun now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a guy in the container,"..."
links.text: "There was a guy in the container," the lieutenant says slowly. "But he didn't bend any light. That was in the detective's head."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Honestly, guys, we might be moving..."
links.text: "Honestly, guys, we might be moving a spot of drugs through this harbour, but I won't be caught transporting the light-bending mega-rich." He shakes his head. "I have a reputation to protect."

links.title: You: ""Yes, for god's sake, you're a soci..."
links.text: "Yes, for god's sake, you're a socialist."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You're right, Harry. I *am* a soci..."
links.text: "You're right, Harry. I *am* a socialist." His face turns serious. "I'm going to catch the mega rich guy inside the container and harvest his energy to power the harbour's fog lights."

links.title: You: ""The mega rich are people too. He w..."
links.text: "The mega rich are people too. He was a nice man. Gave me stock tips."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""No, they're not." He smiles bright..."
links.text: "No, they're not." He smiles brightly. "They're vermin and one just found a way inside my container. Soon he'll bring the others. All three of them. Thank you for telling me. I'll see to this immediately."

links.title: You: ""Yes, the transportation of the meg..."
links.text: "Yes, the transportation of the mega rich should be more tightly regulated. Didn't seem like he was safe."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You're a fucking idiot, Harry. I l..."
links.text: "You're a fucking idiot, Harry. I love it! Thank you for sharing this deep, idiotic part of yourself with me. A hallucinating market liberal. I love it. So poetic."

links.title: You: ""You should be honoured by the pres..."
links.text: "You should be honoured by the presence of this magus. He was of half-Revacholian blood and amassed his wealth using the mysterious bond of nationhood."

links.title: You: ""I may have changed my mind about g..."
links.text: "I may have changed my mind about getting those signatures."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you for understanding," the..."
links.text: "Thank you for understanding," the lieutenant looks him in the eye. "We will continue to do what we must."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You too, lieutenant -- heh!" He ch..."
links.text: "You too, lieutenant -- heh!" He chuckles, suddenly. "You know, I like you, but you never were my favourite. I'm a Harry-guy. I'm Team Harry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""None taken," the lieutenant quickl..."
links.text: "None taken," the lieutenant quickly replies and then turns to you: "Did we have anything else to do here, Harry?"

links.title: You: ""I mailed the signatures you asked..."
links.text: "I mailed the signatures you asked me to get." (Lie.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""No, you didn't." He waves you off..."
links.text: "No, you didn't." He waves you off with a chuckle. "I know the mail-man, Harry. I know everyone and everything that happens in this town and I *know* there's no letter in that mailbox yet."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Just like I *know* you'll get it d..."
links.text: "Just like I *know* you'll get it done. Once you stop horsing around." He nods reassuringly. "Let me know when it's done."

links.title: Drama: "It's not gonna be as easy this time..."
links.text: It's not gonna be as easy this time.

links.title: You: ""It's done. I mailed the signatures..."
links.text: "It's done. I mailed the signatures you asked me to mail."

links.title: You: ""What message?""
links.text: "What message?"

links.title: You: ""I'm reconsidering opening that doo..."
links.text: "I'm reconsidering opening that door you asked me to open. Perhaps it will help me somehow..."

links.title: You: ""Evrart, about the weasel...""
links.text: "Evrart, about the weasel..."

links.title: You: "Remain quiet."
links.text: Remain quiet.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "He narrows his eyes at you for a br..."
links.text: He narrows his eyes at you for a brief moment. 'Why didn't he follow the etiquette?', he seems to ask himself.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Anyway, I'm glad to see you making..."
links.text: "Anyway, I'm glad to see you making such headway with your endeavours. I look forward to seeing the end result. Is there anything else on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""I opened the door you asked me. Ca..."
links.text: "I opened the door you asked me. Can we discuss the murder now?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Wait..." He leans reaches into his..."
links.text: "Wait..." He leans reaches into his drawer and pulls out a plastic card. "You need this to get in and out through the gate."

links.title: You: ""Is that a Union card? I already ha..."
links.text: "Is that a Union card? I already have one."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""It's wonderful that you've stolen..."
links.text: "It's wonderful that you've stolen a membership card, but this is a *key card*. You can't get out of the harbour without it."

links.title: You: ""Um, thanks. I was wondering how I'..."
links.text: "Um, thanks. I was wondering how I'm supposed to get out."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Here -- you're one of us now. A re..."
links.text: "Here -- you're one of us now. A real red and white Union man. Take care, Harry."

links.title: You: ""Great! Wouldn't want to get stuck..."
links.text: "Great! Wouldn't want to get stuck in here."

links.title: You: "(Lie.) "I opened the door to your w..."
links.text: (Lie.) "I opened the door to your weasel's den."

links.title: Composure: "You *want* to cry? God, you're weak..."
links.text: You *want* to cry? God, you're weak. Whatever you do, don't cry. He'll think you're disgusting.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""*Mr. Du Bois*, you don't look so g..."
links.text: "*Mr. Du Bois*, you don't look so good..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois... Mr. Du Bois! Harry!..."
links.text: "Mr. Du Bois... Mr. Du Bois! Harry!!!" The large man snaps his fingers, but to no effect -- you're in some stupor.

links.title: You: "Keep sliding down the chair like a..."
links.text: Keep sliding down the chair like a jello shot.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "While Evrart is distracted by your..."
links.text: While Evrart is distracted by your odd behaviour, the lieutenant's eyes are mapping everything around you. The folder, desk, papers on the wall...

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois... Are you okay? Can I..."
links.text: "Mr. Du Bois... Are you okay? Can I get you a glass of water or something? Are you having some kind of medical emergency?"

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah, man -- I'm fucking great...."
links.text: "Oh yeah, man -- I'm fucking great..." (Keep sliding.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't be dramatic. I can see your..."
links.text: "Don't be dramatic. I can see your condition isn't terminal."

links.title: You: ""Actually, this chair is uncomforta..."
links.text: "Actually, this chair is uncomfortable. I could use that glass of water." (Sit upright.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What an odd demonstration of... hu..."
links.text: "What an odd demonstration of... huh, you got me, Harry... I don't even know *what*. As entertaining as it was, I'm afraid we're wasting our time, and I'm an extremely busy man, as I'm sure you are too."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, enough! We are here to ask y..."
links.text: "Okay, enough! We are here to ask you some questions pertaining to a murder investigation."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Quick, here's your window! Get your..."
links.text: Quick, here's your window! Get yourself together and ask him questions! Police officer questions!

links.title: Volition: "It is about a time to stop embarras..."
links.text: It is about a time to stop embarrassing yourself. Questions will help you regain some of your lost dignity.

links.title: You: ""I'm melting...""
links.text: "I'm melting..."

links.title: Composure: "Maybe you could use your hands some..."
links.text: Maybe you could use your hands somehow? In a kind of throwing motion? Like you're *throwing* that Mr. Du Bois act right back at him. *He's* Mr. Du Bois!

links.title: You: ""Nah, I'm as good as it gets, *Mr...."
links.text: "Nah, I'm as good as it gets, *Mr. Du Bois*." (Vaguely gesture with your hands above your head.)

links.title: You: "There are no *Harries*. Let your mi..."
links.text: There are no *Harries*. Let your mind go to your safe place.

links.title: Composure: "What is this *Mr. Du Bois* he keeps..."
links.text: What is this *Mr. Du Bois* he keeps repeating? *What* is he trying to pull here? You need to cool the fuck down, CHILL.

links.title: You: ""I met a girl named Acele who said..."
links.text: "I met a girl named Acele who said she's working with you."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Funny..." The big man lets out a l..."
links.text: "Funny..." The big man lets out a lazy yawn. "That doesn't ring any bells, Harry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Funny," the lieutenant says, looki..."
links.text: "Funny," the lieutenant says, looking up from his notebook. "She was trying to set up a narcotics operation in the old church on the coast."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, that Acele!" He taps his templ..."
links.text: "Oh, that Acele!" He taps his temple. "Yes, I do seem to remember sending a pretty young thing down there to liven up the place. Get some anodic music in there."

links.title: You: ""Did you also tell her to start the..."
links.text: "Did you also tell her to start the amphetamine lab?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Amphetamine lab?" He seems taken a..."
links.text: "Amphetamine lab?" He seems taken aback. "That sound very immoral and debauched. Frankly a health risk."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But what do I know about kids thes..."
links.text: "But what do I know about kids these days, the music they listen to, the drugs they do while they listen to that music..." He shakes his head with a melancholy smile.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It sounds to me like you're trying..."
links.text: "It sounds to me like you're trying to start an amphetamine lab in the district," the lieutenant says with an uncharacteristic note of contempt in his voice. "And you're using some delinquents you found god knows where to set it up and run it for you."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""'Found god knows where'?" The big..."
links.text: "'Found god knows where'?" The big man exhales loudly. "That *Acele* is the daughter of Mico the Kebab -- a man who once killed a guy with a kebab."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I think a daughter of a man who ki..."
links.text: "I think a daughter of a man who killed a man with a kebab can handle running a little nightclub, don't you?"

links.title: You: ""Mico the Kebab? Really?""
links.text: "Mico the Kebab? Really?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Maybe it was Bogowir? Or Jakub?" H..."
links.text: "Maybe it was Bogowir? Or Jakub?" He stares off into the distance, seemingly trying to remember something. "I think it might have been Konrad..."

links.title: You: ""Anyway, I shut down the amphetamin..."
links.text: "Anyway, I shut down the amphetamine production, but let them go on with the nightclub plan."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""A nightclub..." He taps on his chi..."
links.text: "A nightclub..." He taps on his chin. "Harry, I'm an old fashioned guy. After work I like to listen to some rock and roll music and have a non-alcoholic lager. Nightclubs don't interest me."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But here I am, talking about mysel..."
links.text: "But here I am, talking about myself, when you have much more important things going on." His expression becomes serious. "Tell me, Harry, how can I help you?"

links.title: You: ""I let them go on with their operat..."
links.text: "I let them go on with their operation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant tilts his head but m..."
links.text: The lieutenant tilts his head but makes no comment.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Well, you know how it is, Harry. K..."
links.text: "Well, you know how it is, Harry. Kids will be kids." He glances at the photo on his desk. "At her age, me and Edgar were getting drunk, sneaking out at night, throwing rocks at motor carriages..."

links.title: Authority: "Throwing rocks at motor carriages i..."
links.text: Throwing rocks at motor carriages isn't really the same thing as running a drug lab, is it?

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But anyway, don't let me drift awa..."
links.text: "But anyway, don't let me drift away to memory lane." He adjusts himself in the chair. "Tell me how can I help you, Harry."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""Are you using some random kids to..."
links.text: "Are you using some random kids to start an amphetamine lab?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""'Random kids'?" The big man exhale..."
links.text: "'Random kids'?" The big man exhales loudly. "That there is the daughter of Mico the Kebab -- a man who once killed a guy with a kebab."

links.title: You: ""Anodic music? Liven up the place?..."
links.text: "Anodic music? Liven up the place? Yes, that checks out. Let's change the subject."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, Harry." The big man wriggles..."
links.text: "Yes, Harry." The big man wriggles in his chair like a giant smiling caterpillar. "Let's talk about what's *really* important to you."

links.title: You: ""Funny, she was trying to set up a..."
links.text: "Funny, she was trying to set up a narcotics operation in the old church on the coast."

links.title: You: ""Aren't you going to ask me how I g..."
links.text: "Aren't you going to ask me how I got in?"

links.title: Composure: "Who does this guy think you are --..."
links.text: Who does this guy think you are -- Ronnie the Rookie? You ain't worried about no lost gun or unpaid bill or forgotten name! You're the *bad cop*, you're probably more corrupt than him!

links.title: You: "Wait, that's it? That's my point of..."
links.text: Wait, that's it? That's my point of pride here?

links.title: Composure: "Fuck yeah! Remember when you tried..."
links.text: Fuck yeah! Remember when you tried *The Expression* on that little minx in the silver jumpsuit? That was *you*.

links.title: Suggestion: "Try it on Evrart!"
links.text: Try it on Evrart!

links.title: Composure: "Fuck yes! You're part of the old gu..."
links.text: Fuck yes! You're part of the old guard, the *ancient* guard -- the most corrupt, unholy cops in the land. Chill out like the *black dragon* you are.

links.title: Suggestion: "Summon a smile on your face. A big..."
links.text: Summon a smile on your face. A big shit eating grin like his.

links.title: You: "Give him *The Expression* -- *Click..."
links.text: Give him *The Expression* -- *Click-click*.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "The fat man seems to be enjoying yo..."
links.text: The fat man seems to be enjoying your rigor mortis grin -- he shoots one just like it right back at you.

links.title: Composure: "Good. Now lean in with some *corrup..."
links.text: Good. Now lean in with some *corruption*.

links.title: You: ""Listen, Evrart -- pal, we both kno..."
links.text: "Listen, Evrart -- pal, we both know what makes the wheels of the world turn."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""That we do, Harry. Let them say wh..."
links.text: "That we do, Harry. Let them say what they will about you and me, we're both born fighters."

links.title: You: ""This fighter could've used a more..."
links.text: "This fighter could've used a more comfortable *chair*."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I do want you to feel at home, Har..."
links.text: "I do want you to feel at home, Harry, truly. But you'll have to excuse the humble accommodations."

links.title: Composure: "That's it -- now kick back and add..."
links.text: That's it -- now kick back and add a final flourish. For *dignity*.

links.title: You: ""Thanks for your hospitality. Feel..."
links.text: "Thanks for your hospitality. Feel free to visit me down at the station any time."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You strike me as a reasonable man,..."
links.text: "You strike me as a reasonable man, Harry -- I like that in a *lawman*." He smiles. "Let's cut to the chase, shall we? What can Evrart Claire do for you?"

links.title: You: ""This is a würm's lair and we both..."
links.text: "This is a würm's lair and we both know why I'm here -- to help grow your hoard."

links.title: You: ""I'm not saying I'm corrupt. I'm *r..."
links.text: "I'm not saying I'm corrupt. I'm *rational*."

links.title: You: ""Mhm. *This* fighter only sits on a..."
links.text: "Mhm. *This* fighter only sits on a throne."

links.title: You: ""Nice bit with the chair, by the wa..."
links.text: "Nice bit with the chair, by the way..." (Chuckle.) "A good way to keep your guests on edge."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Why, thank you, it's always nice w..."
links.text: "Why, thank you, it's always nice when a fellow professional appreciates your work."

links.title: You: "Give him *The Expression* -- and th..."
links.text: Give him *The Expression* -- and the finger pistols!

links.title: Evrart Claire: "*Snap, snap!* The fat man shoots th..."
links.text: *Snap, snap!* The fat man shoots those finger pistols right back at you. He seems to be enjoying the display.

links.title: You: "Relax, loosen up -- get *comfortabl..."
links.text: Relax, loosen up -- get *comfortable*.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "You cross your legs and yawn. The f..."
links.text: You cross your legs and yawn. The fat man does the same -- sinking deeper into his chair than one would think is physically possible. He seems to be enjoying your little display.

links.title: You: "Sink deep into the folding chair. S..."
links.text: Sink deep into the folding chair. Smile and cross your hands behind your back.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "The fat man does the same -- sinkin..."
links.text: The fat man does the same -- sinking deeper into his chair than one would think is physically possible. He seems to be enjoying your little display.

links.title: You: ""You called me 'Mr. Du Bois.' Why?""
links.text: "You called me 'Mr. Du Bois.' Why?"

links.title: You: ""How do you know my name?""
links.text: "How do you know my name?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we'd like to ask you a few..."
links.text: "I think we'd like to ask you a few questions. Don't you think so, detective?" The lieutenant looks quite fed up with the situation.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Somehow you managed to get yourself..."
links.text: Somehow you managed to get yourself out of this one. Now quick, keep the momentum up, ask questions!

links.title: Authority: "Questions will show him who's boss."
links.text: Questions will show him who's boss.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Whatever you do, don't ask him abou..."
links.text: Whatever you do, don't ask him about the gun first. You don't want him thinking you're scared.

links.title: You: ""I wanted to go over a couple of th..."
links.text: "I wanted to go over a couple of things about me."

links.title: You: ""Could you help me get a dead body..."
links.text: "Could you help me get a dead body down from a tree?"

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about my lost gun.""
links.text: "Let's talk about my lost gun."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, it's beginning to dawn on m..."
links.text: "Harry, it's beginning to dawn on me that you're a real fascist. A mega-fascist who imagines mega rich light-bending fascists. I love it! Thank you for sharing this facet of yourself with me."

links.title: Evrart Claire: "He bursts out laughing. "I shudder..."
links.text: He bursts out laughing. "I shudder to think what you're going to tell me next, Harry."

links.title: Drama: "Not for one second did he believe t..."
links.text: Not for one second did he believe there's an actual mega rich person somewhere in his containertown.

links.title: You: ""A few more questions about the har..."
links.text: "A few more questions about the harbour."

links.title: You: ""I've actually walked the path of s..."
links.text: "I've actually walked the path of sobriety for a while now."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I can see that, Harry." He studies..."
links.text: "I can see that, Harry." He studies your face. "Alcohol has left its marks, but you're doing better than when I first saw you. Rich-man is shitting himself -- the working class, sober!"

links.title: You: ""You used my intellectual curiosity..."
links.text: "You used my intellectual curiosity against me."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Against you?" He's taken aback. "O..."
links.text: "Against you?" He's taken aback. "Oh, Harry, I'd like to think I used it *for* you."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Hmm... it *was* interesting. No arg..."
links.text: Hmm... it *was* interesting. No arguing against that.

links.title: You: ""But she said she's insane. Like me.""
links.text: "But she said she's insane. Like me."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""She's not insane. What did she tel..."
links.text: "She's not insane. What did she tell you?" His expression betrays extreme scepticism.

links.title: You: ""She told me she's over-radiated fr..."
links.text: "She told me she's over-radiated from pale transit."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""No, she's not," he scoffs. "She's..."
links.text: "No, she's not," he scoffs. "She's a sentimental alcoholic, they all are. Never take a drop and you'll be eight laps ahead of those upper-class winos, just like old Mr. Claire here. Try it, you'll be a real superdetective."

links.title: You: ""She has this sentimentality and lo..."
links.text: "She has this sentimentality and longing about her..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Heh," he scoffs. "She's a sentimen..."
links.text: "Heh," he scoffs. "She's a sentimental alcoholic. They all are, Harry. Never take a drop and you'll be eight laps ahead of the upper-class winos, just like old Mr. Claire here. Try it. You'll be a real superdetective."

links.title: You: ""So what's going to happen now?" (C..."
links.text: "So what's going to happen now?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What was always going to happen. W..."
links.text: "What was always going to happen. We take the harbour and she fucks off to Ozonne, uncorks a bottle of wine, calls her partners and says they need to distance themselves from this nasty business before the big shit spinner splashes everyone."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Only difference is the Union doesn..."
links.text: "Only difference is the Union doesn't have to lose 2,000 men to machine gun fire."

links.title: You: ""You could have just told me, I wou..."
links.text: "You could have just told me, I would have been on board."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, when I need to *tell* peopl..."
links.text: "Harry, when I need to *tell* people, I might as well do it myself! That's why I like initiative -- and *inspiring* initiative. It's more *natural* that way."

links.title: You: ""Damn, Evrart, I was hoping I'd som..."
links.text: "Damn, Evrart, I was hoping I'd somehow get to fuck you over in the end. Not the other way around."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Damn, Harry..." He shakes his head..."
links.text: "Damn, Harry..." He shakes his head. "I was hoping that too, but the information I gave you proved too powerful."

links.title: You: ""But I swore fealty to her. She was..."
links.text: "But I swore fealty to her. She was my beautiful laede."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Fealty-swealty, Harry. You knew so..."
links.text: "Fealty-swealty, Harry. You knew something -- something big. And you wanted to see what happens when you tell someone. So you told her. Anyone who's ever been close to power will tell you: inside information is the sweetest thing in the world."

links.title: You: ""I have a bad taste in my mouth. Yo..."
links.text: "I have a bad taste in my mouth. You better make sure this ends up saving lives."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""That it will, Harry. That it will...."
links.text: "That it will, Harry. That it will." A sincere smile crosses his face. "As to the *bad taste* -- please. You're not a sommelier, you're a cop."

links.title: You: ""Look, I just want to do police wor..."
links.text: "Look, I just want to do police work."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, of course, Harry," he says, s..."
links.text: "Yes, of course, Harry," he says, smiling like a fox. "That's why you went to her and relayed every little thing I told you."

links.title: You: ""Oh, fuck off... I don't drink more..."
links.text: "Oh, fuck off... I don't drink more than everyone else!"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""See, this is what they want us to..."
links.text: "See, this is what they want us to do -- suck on that sugar-and-wine teat until we're insane, like they are. You gotta be smarter than that, Harry, or you'll *lose*."

links.title: Volition: "And you've already lost for so long..."
links.text: And you've already lost for so long.

links.title: You: ""That's actually... good advice. I..."
links.text: "That's actually... good advice. I might."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Don't just say it, Harry." He wags..."
links.text: "Don't just say it, Harry." He wags his finger at you. "Do it. We gotta be more disciplined than they are, or we'll *lose*."

links.title: You: ""If that's what it takes, I'll do i..."
links.text: "If that's what it takes, I'll do it -- for the working class."

links.title: You: ""I want to talk about the hanging.""
links.text: "I want to talk about the hanging."

links.title: You: ""Wait, you know Garte?""
links.text: "Wait, you know Garte?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, I know Lawrence. He's a real..."
links.text: "Yes, I know Lawrence. He's a real character -- no Union man in him. A real piece of work, that boy is."

links.title: Drama: "With a grin he points to the cheque..."
links.text: With a grin he points to the cheque again. It's like you're on a game show... *At least* don't thank him for it.

links.title: You: ""Thank you, Evrart." (Take the comi..."
links.text: "Thank you, Evrart." (Take the comically large cheque.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Don't mention it. But also don't f..."
links.text: "Don't mention it. But also don't forget it." Another wink. "I'm just kidding, of course."

links.title: Authority: "Is he?"
links.text: Is he?

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's not."
links.text: He's not.

links.title: You: "(Take the comically large cheque bu..."
links.text: (Take the comically large cheque but don't say anything.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Is there anything you'd like to sa..."
links.text: "Is there anything you'd like to say to me, or...?"

links.title: Volition: "No."
links.text: No.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, thanks!""
links.text: "Yeah, thanks!"

links.title: You: ""No, it's cool." (You've got integr..."
links.text: "No, it's cool." (You've got integrity.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""*Cool*? I wouldn't go that far. I'..."
links.text: "*Cool*? I wouldn't go that far. I'm sure there are cooler things than delivering a comically oversized novelty cheque to a cafeteria manager, but, sure... if that's what's cool nowadays."

links.title: You: ""Keep it, I'm good." (Leave the che..."
links.text: "Keep it, I'm good." (Leave the cheque.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Okay, okay... I respect a man with..."
links.text: "Okay, okay... I respect a man with principles. No handouts, then." He crosses his arms on his ample midsection -- and sinks further into his chair.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now, I'd like to set your mind at..."
links.text: "Now, I'd like to set your mind at ease about one other matter: your *lost gun*. Let me assure you, Union people are on it as we speak. I've got my best hounds looking for that *lost gun*."

links.title: You: ""You can take that comically large..."
links.text: "You can take that comically large cheque and shove it up your ass!" (Leave it.)

links.title: You: ""Can we go over a few details conce..."
links.text: "Can we go over a few details concerning the murder again?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: "His slug-like lips move, but all yo..."
links.text: His slug-like lips move, but all you hear is an echo: lost gun, lost gun, lost gun...

links.title: Half Light: "The world is swallowed by a black h..."
links.text: The world is swallowed by a black hole of fear. Only two words escape its gravitational pull: *lost* and *gun*.

links.title: Drama: "When he said "don't worry" he actua..."
links.text: When he said "don't worry" he actually meant "be very worried."

links.title: You: ""How do *you* know about my lost gu..."
links.text: "How do *you* know about my lost gun?!"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I know *everything*, Harry. Right..."
links.text: "I know *everything*, Harry. Right now I know that you're worried. Don't be worried. Everything's going to be alright."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""It's not like you left it loaded...."
links.text: "It's not like you left it loaded. You didn't lose a *loaded gun*. Local children aren't out there playing with it right now, pointing it into their own mouths... It's in a safe place. I just know it. I have a feeling everything's going to be alright."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "It was loaded. There were two bulle..."
links.text: It was loaded. There were two bullets in it. You always keep at least two barrels  loaded.

links.title: You: ""Kim, uhm, Kim..." (Turn to Kim.)"
links.text: "Kim, uhm, Kim..." (Turn to Kim.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, we will deal with this la..."
links.text: "Officer, we will deal with this later. We don't need Mr. Claire's help with this."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I wouldn't be so sure about that,"..."
links.text: "I wouldn't be so sure about that," he says, as though to himself.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Lieutenant Kitsuragi doesn't seem..."
links.text: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi doesn't seem to be here at the moment. You came alone."

links.title: You: "Don't panic."
links.text: Don't panic.

links.title: Composure: "God, you're sweating... your knee i..."
links.text: God, you're sweating... your knee is jerking... you're about to cry, aren't you? You're about to cry, because you lost your gun and those children are going to shoot themselves with it.

links.title: You: "No, I'm *not* about to cry! (Try to..."
links.text: No, I'm *not* about to cry! (Try to stay cool.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""*Mr. Du Bois*, you don't look so g..."
links.text: "*Mr. Du Bois*, you don't look so good..."

links.title: You: "So what. Men can cry too."
links.text: So what. Men can cry too.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Oh fuck, it was loaded... There wer..."
links.text: Oh fuck, it was loaded... There were two bullets in it. You always keep at least two barrels loaded.

links.title: You: ""I'm not worried -- I got this.""
links.text: "I'm not worried -- I got this."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Are you alright, Harry? You say yo..."
links.text: "Are you alright, Harry? You say you got this, but you seem a little *anxious* to me. Don't be. Everything's going to be alright."

links.title: You: ""I would appreciate any help you co..."
links.text: "I would appreciate any help you could provide."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Are you alright, Harry? You seem a..."
links.text: "Are you alright, Harry? You seem anxious. Don't be. Everything's going to be alright."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Oh god, why didn't you think of thi..."
links.text: Oh god, why didn't you think of this before -- COPS HAVE GUNS! Where's yours?!

links.title: You: "Pat your pockets."
links.text: Pat your pockets.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's gone. Your gun is gone. There'..."
links.text: It's gone. Your gun is gone. There's nothing in your pockets.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "You don't need a gun. We can still..."
links.text: You don't need a gun. We can still have fun without the gun. The fun doesn't need to stop. HAVE SOME RIGHT NOW.

links.title: You: "This doesn't worry me at all. Who c..."
links.text: This doesn't worry me at all. Who cares if I've lost my gun *and* the love of my life?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Fuck love! This is your *GUN*, this..."
links.text: Fuck love! This is your *GUN*, this is serious.

links.title: Logic: "Okay, police officers have weapons..."
links.text: Okay, police officers have weapons they use to shoot people with, right? It's gotta be on you. Check your pockets.

links.title: You: "Pat your pockets."
links.text: Pat your pockets.

links.title: Logic: "It's gone. It's not there. Your gun..."
links.text: It's gone. It's not there. Your gun is gone.

links.title: You: "This doesn't worry me at all. I don..."
links.text: This doesn't worry me at all. I don't care if I lost my gun and the love of my life.

links.title: Logic: "To hell with love! This is your *GU..."
links.text: To hell with love! This is your *GUN*, it's pretty bad if you lost it...

links.title: You: ""It turns out the strikers are bein..."
links.text: "It turns out the strikers are being served an alcoholic brew. I made it even stronger."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I got it, Harry! It was Radogost...."
links.text: "I got it, Harry! It was Radogost. Radogost the Kebab." He smiles smugly. "But enough of Kojkos and kebabs. What else can I do for you?"

links.title: You: ""It turns out the strikers were bei..."
links.text: "It turns out the strikers were being served an alcoholic brew. I stopped this madness."

links.title: You: ""I did it, Evrart. I turned it off.""
links.text: "I did it, Evrart. I turned it off."

links.title: You: ""I did it, Evrart -- I made it even..."
links.text: "I did it, Evrart -- I made it even shadier."

links.title: You: ""But she told me a beautiful story..."
links.text: "But she told me a beautiful story about the discovery of the Insulinde."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course she did. Rich people hav..."
links.text: "Of course she did. Rich people have the best stories. About all the interesting things they've done and seen, all the beautiful places they've been to. It's just sentimentalism. She can afford to be sentimental -- and she can afford to lose as well."

links.title: Empathy: "It saddens him -- that she can. Sou..."
links.text: It saddens him -- that she can. Sours it, but only a tiny bit.

links.title: You: ""I'm looking into your shady brew.""
links.text: "I'm looking into your shady brew."

links.title: Logic: "And safer, too. You never know who..."
links.text: And safer, too. You never know who you can trust.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You knew something. Something *big..."
links.text: "You knew something. Something *big*. And you wanted to see what happens when you tell someone. So you told her. Anyone who's ever been close to power will tell you: inside information is the sweetest thing in the world."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""It's better than money, it's bette..."
links.text: "It's better than money, it's better than pussy. Money only makes you special for some salesman. Pussy only makes you special for yourself. Information makes you special for all mankind. It's the ticket to history."

links.title: You: ""Hmm...""
Evrart Claire: ""Right on, Harry. What you did was..."
links.text: "Right on, Harry. What you did was participate in history. When history calls, you *have* to pick up. You had no choice. None of us ever do. A hard disco cop like you -- I knew you weren't one to resist temptation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know what, detective? I am goi..."
links.text: "You know what, detective? I am going to leave this out of my report, and I suggest you leave it out of yours too."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Heh," He chuckles. "Just look at t..."
links.text: "Heh," He chuckles. "Just look at the three of us. The three careless boiadeiros. Good times, good times..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But look at me going on and on, li..."
links.text: "But look at me going on and on, like some kind of a father figure." He laughs. "And to think we're about the same age..."

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oooooookay!" He swings his fist th..."
links.text: "Oooooookay!" He swings his fist through the air and shakes his head in agreeance. "Hell yes, it is."

links.title: You: ""So what now?""
links.text: "So what now?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now there's a whole lot of work to..."
links.text: "Now there's a whole lot of work to do! For me *and* for you. I suppose there was a reason you came here, so let's get to it. What can I help my best friend and comrade with today?"

links.title: You: ""So what the fuck now?" (Spread you..."
links.text: "So what the fuck now?" (Spread your arms.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now we let bygones be bygones beca..."
links.text: "Now we let bygones be bygones because there's work to do. For me *and* for you. I suppose there was a reason you came here, so let's have it! What can I help my best friend and comrade with today?"

links.title: You: ""My thoughts exactly.""
links.text: "My thoughts exactly."

links.title: You: ""No-no-no-no-no...""
links.text: "No-no-no-no-no..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Don't beat yourself up, Harry. Wha..."
links.text: "Don't beat yourself up, Harry. What you did was participate in history. When history calls, you *have* to pick up. You had no choice. None of us ever do. A hard disco cop like you -- I knew you weren't one to resist temptation."

links.title: You: ""It does make sense when you word i..."
links.text: "It does make sense when you word it like that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Damn right it does, Harry. What yo..."
links.text: "Damn right it does, Harry. What you did was participate in history. When history calls, you *have* to pick up. You had no choice. None of us ever do. A hard disco cop like you -- I knew you weren't one to resist temptation."

links.title: You: ""I met Joyce, the company represent..."
links.text: "I met Joyce, the company representative."

links.title: You: ""What's in the container that's out..."
links.text: "What's in the container that's outside your office?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""My dear Harry, there are literally..."
links.text: "My dear Harry, there are literally millions of containers in this harbour. I couldn't possibly remember what's in all of them."

links.title: You: ""There' something *special* about i..."
links.text: "There' something *special* about it. It was attached to the Kvalsund crane."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, you smooth-talking son of a..."
links.text: "Harry, you smooth-talking son of a bitch," he says with the fondest of smiles. "Time is a precious resource and I don't have enough of it to count containers with you."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Smooth-talking? Is that what it tak..."
links.text: Smooth-talking? Is that what it takes to open that container? Don't you worry, Savvy has got this -- they *have* to let a VIP in.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Smooth-talking? Maybe *that's* the..."
links.text: Smooth-talking? Maybe *that's* the way to go about opening the container! You should at least *try* convincing it.

links.title: You: ""Never mind the container.""
links.text: "Never mind the container."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I rarely do, Harry. I have people..."
links.text: "I rarely do, Harry. I have people for that." He chuckles. "Now, you were saying...?"

links.title: You: ""Evrart, I'm going to leave now, bu..."
links.text: "Evrart, I'm going to leave now, but we might talk again later." [Leave.]

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""See you soon, débardeur!" The big..."
links.text: "See you soon, débardeur!" The big man raises his hand in farewell. "Just kidding. But not too much."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois, 'Every worker...'?" H..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois, 'Every worker...'?" He leans toward you, waiting for your to complete his sentence.

links.title: You: ""... a member of the board?""
links.text: "... a member of the board?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""That's right, Mr. Du Bois!" He nod..."
links.text: "That's right, Mr. Du Bois!" He nods in approval. "I see the socialist-democratic fervour now burns in your heart too. How can I help you today?"

links.title: You: ""... is a living god!""
links.text: "... is a living god!"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Hahaha... Mr. Du Bois..." His amus..."
links.text: "Hahaha... Mr. Du Bois..." His amusement seems genuine. "So be it! How can I help you today?"

links.title: You: ""... is an organ in the great state..."
links.text: "... is an organ in the great state organism of war! Also, looks just like *me*."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Eeeh... why the hell not?" He chuc..."
links.text: "Eeeh... why the hell not?" He chuckles merrily. "Now, how can I help you today?"

links.title: You: ""... for himself!""
links.text: "... for himself!"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""... and for his fellow man! That's..."
links.text: "... and for his fellow man! That's right, Mr. Du Bois! You're turning out to be quite the individualist there..." The last sentence is spoken more to himself than anybody else. "So, you had business with me?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois..." He looks at you wi..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois..." He looks at you with surprise. "Why on earth are you dressed like my recently deceased security guard?"

links.title: You: ""I'm honouring a great man.""
links.text: "I'm honouring a great man."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""From where I'm sitting, it looks m..."
links.text: "From where I'm sitting, it looks more like you've robbed a dead man, Mr. Du Bois." He leans back. "But as this matter is far below my pay grade, I'm just going to ask: how can I help you today?"

links.title: You: ""It's a political statement. Revach..."
links.text: "It's a political statement. Revachol is for Revacholians."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Very powerful, Mr. Du Bois. This i..."
links.text: "Very powerful, Mr. Du Bois. This is a very powerful statement." He grins far and wide like he doesn't actually think your statement is powerful at all. "Now, how can I help you today, Mr. Political Statement?"

links.title: You: ""Well... look at it! I mean, cool,..."
links.text: "Well... look at it! I mean, cool, right?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""A deceased security guard's unifor..."
links.text: "A deceased security guard's uniform? Oh yeah, in the extreme." He covers his mouth with a sweaty hand. "Now how can I help a cool guy such as yourself today, Harry?"

links.title: You: ""Oops... maybe this isn't entirely..."
links.text: "Oops... maybe this isn't entirely appropriate..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Stealing the clothes of a security..."
links.text: "Stealing the clothes of a security guard who'd only just died of old age?" He seems to ponder it for a moment. "Well, maybe not *entirely*. But -- you had business to discuss with me, Harry?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Du Bois! I hear the meeting wi..."
dialogueTree.text: "Mr. Du Bois! I hear the meeting with Titus was a glowing success." His grin widens. "That's such a relief. Titus can be a handful sometimes."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now, what can Evrart Claire do for..."
links.text: "Now, what can Evrart Claire do for you today?"
